keyMappings:
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map <C-e> scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map <C-y> scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
map <C-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <C-b> scrollFullPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
# map MAP scrollToLeft
# map MAP scrollToRight
# map MAP reload
# map MAP copyCurrentUrl
# map MAP openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
# map MAP openCopiedUrlInNewTab
# map MAP goUp
# map MAP goToRoot
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map <C-v> passNextKey
map <C-o> passNextKey normal
# map MAP focusInput
map s LinkHints.activateMode
# map MAP LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
# map MAP LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
# map MAP LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map <C-s> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
# map MAP LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
# map MAP LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
# map MAP LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
# map MAP LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
# map MAP LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
# map MAP goPrevious
# map MAP goNext
# map MAP nextFrame
# map MAP mainFrame
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode


map <Space>ff Vomnibar.activate
# map MAP Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <Space><Space>e Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
# map MAP Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map <Space>fb Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map <Space>O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
# map MAP Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab


map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map u goBack
map <C-r> goForward

map <Space>bn createTab
# map MAP createTab http://example.com/
map <Space>n createTab window
# map MAP createTab window http://example.com http://example.com/
# map MAP createTab incognito
map [b previousTab
map ]b nextTab
# map MAP visitPreviousTab
# map MAP firstTab
# map MAP lastTab
# map MAP duplicateTab
# map MAP togglePinTab
# map MAP toggleMuteTab
map <Space>c removeTab
# TODO map <Space>q <A-F4>
# map MAP restoreTab
map <C-w>T moveTabToNewWindow
map <Space>bl closeTabsOnLeft
map <Space>br closeTabsOnRight
map <Space>bc closeOtherTabs
map <b moveTabLeft
map >b moveTabRight

map ? showHelp
# TODO
# map <Space>h <Space>ffhttp://example.com/<Enter>
# map <Space>h openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab url=http://thesast.github.io/dawn
searchEngines:
s: https://www.startpage.com/do/search?q=%s
y: https://youtube.com/results?search_query=%s
r: https://www.reddit.com/search/?q=%s
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s
h: https://hn.algolia.com/?q=%s
p: https://www.phind.com/search?q=%s
c: https://crates.io/search?q=%s
